mainText:
I never had the opportunity to talk with Steve in person, but my family and I feel deeply saddened, almost as if we just lost a member of our own family...   
Thank you Steve, for your passion and creativity that revolutionized the world.  You will be missed, but never forgotten.  

My family wishes to pass along our sympathy and heartfelt prayers to the entire Jobs' family in their time of grief.
header: He was (still IS) a true inspiration.
author: Anonymous
